00021 #ifndef UTIL_H_
00022 #define UTIL_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h" // macros
00025 #include "Exception.h"
00026 #include "Array.h"
00027 
00028 #include <math.h>
00029 
00030 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00031 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00032 
00033 template<class T>
00034 inline void carraycopy(const T src[], std::size_t srcPos, T dest[],
00035         std::size_t destPos, std::size_t length) throw (Exception) {
00036     for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00037         dest[destPos + i] = src[srcPos + i];
00038     }
00039 }
00040 
00041 template<class T>
00042 inline void arraycopy(const Array<T> & src, std::size_t srcPos, Array<T> & dest,
00043         std::size_t destPos, std::size_t length) throw (Exception) {
00044 
00045     std::size_t srcSize = src.length;
00046     std::size_t destSize = dest.length;
00047     if (srcPos + length > srcSize) sthrow(ArrayException, "Source array too short");
00048     if (destPos + length > destSize) sthrow(ArrayException, "Dest array too short");
00049 
00050     for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00051         dest[destPos + i] = src[srcPos + i];
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 template <typename T, std::size_t N>
00056 inline std::size_t carraysize(T(&)[N]) {
00057     return N;
00058 }
00059 
00060 template<class T, class U = T>
00061 inline U abs(T t) {
00062     return t > 0 ? t : -t;
00063 }
00064 
00065 template<>
00066 inline unsigned int abs<int, unsigned int>(int t) {
00067     return t > 0 ? t : -t;
00068 }
00069 
00070 template<>
00071 inline unsigned long abs<long, unsigned long>(long t) {
00072     return t > 0 ? t : -t;
00073 }
00074 
00075 template<>
00076 inline unsigned short abs<short, unsigned short>(short t) {
00077     return t > 0 ? t : -t;
00078 }
00079 
00080 template<class T>
00081 inline signed char sign(T t) {
00082     return t > 0? : t == 0? 0 : -1;
00083 }
00084 
00085 template<>
00086 inline signed char sign<double>(double t) {
00087     return copysign(1.0,t);
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 template<>
00092 inline signed char sign<float>(float t) {
00093     return copysignf(1.0f, t);
00094 }
00095
